mapper.insert: insert into user (UserID, Score, Diamond, Experience, InfullAmount, VIP, PlayScore, WinScore, PlayTime, LockCannon, GunStyle, FaceStyle, VipIntegral) values (#{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{score,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{diamond,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{experience,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{infullamount,jdbcType=REAL}, #{vip,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{playscore,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{winscore,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{playtime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{lockcannon,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gunstyle,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{facestyle,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{vipintegral,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.update:
update user
Score = #{score,jdbcType=BIGINT},
Diamond = #{diamond,jdbcType=BIGINT},
Experience = #{experience,jdbcType=BIGINT},
InfullAmount = #{infullamount,jdbcType=REAL},
VIP = #{vip,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PlayScore = #{playscore,jdbcType=BIGINT},
WinScore = #{winscore,jdbcType=BIGINT},
PlayTime = #{playtime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
LockCannon = #{lockcannon,jdbcType=INTEGER},
GunStyle = #{gunstyle,jdbcType=INTEGER},
FaceStyle = #{facestyle,jdbcType=INTEGER},
VipIntegral = #{vipintegral,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where UserID = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
